title: The Island: Castaway v1.1 (Full)
description:
Intense challenges await you in The Island - Castaway, an extremely addictive simulation game. You are one of the lucky few to escape a sinking ocean liner. 

Stranded on an island, you will have to learn to fish and hunt for wild boars, catch snakes and find rare plants. 

But itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not all about staying alive. Explore the enigmatic island to find clues, solve over 200 diverse quests and decrypt ancient writings. Solving these mysteries could be your only chance to get back home! Dive into this riveting adventure today!

Features:

- 12 Absorbing locations 
- 14 Unique and fascinating characters 
- Over 200 quests to solve 
- Huge, perplexing island to investigate 
- Plot that's full of twists and turns
